item.description:
Bring one of your own new or old project you would like to start or finish.  Last month some of us  made earrings. Abelille also has kits you can purchase starting about $10.00 & up (also discounts for tools, & supplies purchased) . Lets think  Christmas or maybe something you want to work on outside of home.

Will bring  snack & beverage to share .

Have a group project idea let us know !
item.how_to_find_us: At table working on an old or new project

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Free Monthly DIY Crafts Meetup to start or finish a project
